entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sept-Îles
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:48 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -23.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sept-Îles Airport 1:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -23.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 57 %
Wind Chill: -39
Dewpoint: -29.6°C
Wind: WNW 41 km/h gust 57 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 25 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 25 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 42 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 27. Wind chill near minus 45. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
